channel.title: Audit services :: Juice's documentation
channel.description: Versions latest 7.0.2 Quick access Data audit Configure entity model Implement an auditable DbContext Handle DataEvent Default audit service Core concept Usage Configuration Programming API Data audit We already have a data audit framework based on EF Core and fully implemented in the DbContextBase abstract class.
